interpolate[source]

interpolate(lex, removed_indices=[])

Method does interpolation based on the removed indices. Substitutes the missing values based on the previous value in the array

Parameters:

  • lex : <class 'inspect._empty'>

  • removed_indices : <class 'list'>, optional
